source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a time-lapse video of a night sky over a rocky landscape. Clouds move quickly across the frame, eventually clearing to reveal a brilliant, star-filled sky. The Milky Way becomes increasingly visible as the clouds dissipate.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.initial_feedback: 1. It is not specifically of the night sky, as the scene opens on a blue sky with clouds. As the time-lapse proceeds, then we see the night sky and stars.
source_caption_data.gpt_feedback: 1. The video does not initially depict a night sky, as it begins with a blue sky and clouds. As the time-lapse progresses, the transition to a night sky with stars becomes apparent.
source_caption_data.final_feedback: 1. The video does not initially depict a night sky, as it begins with a blue sky and clouds. As the time-lapse progresses, the transition to a night sky with stars becomes apparent. Keep the details of the clouds moving quickly.
source_caption_data.gpt_caption: This time-lapse video begins with a blue sky and clouds moving quickly across a rocky landscape. As the time-lapse progresses, the sky transitions to night, revealing a brilliant, star-filled sky. The Milky Way becomes increasingly visible as the clouds dissipate.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This time-lapse video begins with a blue sky and clouds moving quickly across a rocky landscape. As the time-lapse progresses, the sky transitions to night, revealing a brilliant, star-filled sky. The Milky Way becomes increasingly visible as the clouds dissipate.

bad_caption: A group of deer slowly walks across a grassy meadow as the sun rises in the background. As the video continues, the deer begin to graze, occasionally lifting their heads to look around. In the final moments, a flock of birds flies overhead, and the deer move toward the edge of a nearby forest.
